Package m2mimud.game

Interface Summary
GameChooserListener A listener the game choosers uses to notify that the selected screen has changed.
GCWindowListener This interface is for any class that needs information from the GameChooserWindow objectm specifically, which session, if any, was selected.
PlayerCacheListener The PlayerCacheListenr is an interfacer for any object that wishes to be informed when a player has timd out.
PlayerCommunicator The PlayerCommunicator is an interface for any object which wishes to communicate with the player.
 

Class Summary
DeathData This class is used to store information about when a player or monster is killed.
FriendsList The friends' list is an object which stores information about a player's friends.
GameChooser The Gamechooser object is the one that maintains the list available games sessions.
GameChooserWindow The game chooser window is the window which displays the available session.
GameSystem The GameSystem object serves two roles.
Interface The interface class is responsible for controlling the interaction between the the player and the game.
MapWindow The MapWindow is just that, a small window which displays the map, the current location of the player, and the time of day it is
MudClient The MudClient class is the GUI window for the game.
PlayerCache The player cache contains a listing of all the player characters that are currently present in the game as well the unihandle to the game unit which controls.
PlayerRefresher The PlayerRefresher object is one which serves as the heartbeat of the player.
SayData The say data object contains the information needed to do a say command, which is basically a localized (around the player's location) yell.
